item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称 2025 年仍宜降息一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）重申，他认为今年降息一次是合适的，不过这可能会根据通胀和劳动力市场的情况发生变化。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic reiterated he sees one interest-rate cut as appropriate for this year, though that could change based on what happens with inflation and the labor market.】

item.title: 法院胜诉后，Alphabet 和苹果公司股价大涨
item.description: 由于 Alphabet 公司和苹果公司在法庭上获胜，科技巨头股回升，美国股市周三上扬，结束了两日连跌。【原文：US stocks advanced on Wednesday, snapping a two-day losing streak as tech megacaps recovered thanks to a court victory for Alphabet Inc. and Apple Inc.】

item.title: 银行期待从存款互换热潮中分一杯羹
item.description: 在两年多前的行业动荡期间，帮助地区性贷款机构保留大量客户存款的业务一直在蓬勃发展。现在，银行也想分一杯羹。【原文：A business that helped regional lenders keep large customer deposits during the industry turmoil over two years ago has been booming. Now banks want their cut.】

item.title: ServiceNow为联邦政府提供70%的折扣，推动人工智能发展
item.description: ServiceNow 公司正在为联邦机构提供高达 70% 的软件折扣，此举的目的是在特朗普政府要求政府更快地实施人工智能工具之际，刺激其采用该软件。【原文：ServiceNow Inc. is offering federal agencies discounts of as much as 70% on its software, a move aimed at spurring adoption as the Trump administration presses for faster government implementation of artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: You.com 成为独角兽，放弃搜索引擎计划
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 You.com 在新一轮 1 亿美元的融资中估值达到了 15 亿美元，这是该公司继续从消费搜索转向更通用的人工智能服务的一部分。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup You.com has reached a valuation of $1.5 billion in a new $100 million funding round — part of the company’s continued pivot away from a consumer search and toward more general artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨利姆发出政策形势良好的信号，并警告风险
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，利率已为当前的经济环境做好了准备。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said interest rates are well positioned for the current economic environment.】

item.title: 波兰降息，原因是通胀疲软大于财政风险
item.description: 波兰央行在五个月内第三次降息，此前通胀率已降至 3% 以下，物价压力的下降超过了宽松财政政策带来的风险。【原文：Poland’s central bank cut interest rates for the third time in five months after inflation slipped below 3%, with the decline in price pressures outweighing risks stemming from loose fiscal policy.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行就潜在的加元 AT1 销售向投资者发出声音
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大皇家银行正在考虑出售以加元计价的附加一级票据，以帮助为其即将回购的 AT1 债务再融资。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada is looking at selling Additional Tier 1 notes in Canadian dollars, to help refinance AT1 debt that it can soon buy back, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 随着改革赌注的增加，黎巴嫩债券摆脱了臭名昭著的 20 美分俱乐部
item.description: 黎巴嫩的违约债券五年来首次升至每美元 20 美分以上，因为投资者押注该国的政治和经济改革正在获得动力。【原文：Lebanon’s defaulted bonds have risen above 20 cents on the dollar for the first time in five years as investors wager the country’s political and economic reforms are gaining momentum.】

item.title: 调查显示，欧佩克 8 月石油产量在供应恢复的情况下有所增长
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，欧佩克（OPEC）上个月提高了原油产量，因为该组织及其盟国继续恢复停止的供应。【原文：OPEC bolstered crude production last month as the group and its allies continued to revive halted supplies, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: Cato Networks 将收购 Aim Security，以提高人工智能的安全性
item.description: 以色列网络安全公司 Cato Networks 已同意收购人工智能初创公司 Aim Security，这是该公司的首次收购。【原文：Israeli cybersecurity company Cato Networks has agreed to acquire AI startup Aim Security, marking the firm’s first acquisition.】

item.title: Garmin 抢在苹果新款手表之前推出高端运动手表
item.description: Garmin 有限公司周三发布了一款面向徒步旅行者的升级版顶级耐用智能手表，这比苹果公司预期的高端手表更新早了几天。【原文：Garmin Ltd. on Wednesday unveiled an upgraded, top-of-the-line rugged smartwatch for hikers, days before Apple Inc.’s expected update to its own high-end timepiece.】

item.title: 丹麦首次发行欧洲绿色债券，目标 15.6 亿美元
item.description: 丹麦的目标是发行多达 100 亿克朗（15.6 亿美元）的绿色主权债券，这看起来将成为首个符合欧盟新标准的绿色主权债券。【原文：Denmark is targeting as much as 10 billion kroner ($1.56 billion), in what looks set to be the first sovereign green bond to be aligned with the European Union’s new standards.】

item.title: 欧洲央行会见银行讨论如何为其贷款账簿提供保险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行正试图更好地了解银行如何为其贷款账簿投保，以防范包括信贷违约在内的风险，以及这些风险在金融体系中的最终去向。【原文：The European Central Bank is trying to get a better idea how banks are insuring their loan books against risks including credit default, and where those ultimately end up in the financial system.】

item.title: 投资者以创纪录的速度抢购 CLO，押注贷款复苏
item.description: 债务基金经理们现在正在廉价融资，希望将来能找到便宜的杠杆贷款。【原文：Debt fund managers are raising money cheaply now in the hopes of finding bargain leveraged loans to pounce on in the future.】

item.title: 洪水保险公司海王星因收入增长申请美国首次公开募股
item.description: 海王保险控股公司（Neptune Insurance Holdings Inc.【原文：Neptune Insurance Holdings Inc. filed for an initial public offering in the US, showing growing revenue for the flood insurance company.】

item.title: 阿布扎比人工智能公司 G42 将出售 Presight 2% 的股份
item.description: 阿布扎比主要的人工智能公司 G42 正寻求出售价值约 1 亿美元的 Presight AI Holding Plc 股份，这将为该酋长国越来越多的二次股票发行添砖加瓦。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main artificial intelligence firm G42 is looking to sell a stake worth about $100 million in Presight AI Holding Plc, adding to the growing number of secondary share offerings in the emirate.】

item.title: 经济疲软，新西兰房价跌至两年新低
item.description: 由于经济增长乏力和失业率上升使购房者持观望态度，8月份新西兰房价连续第五个月下跌，创下两年来的新低。【原文：New Zealand house prices fell for a fifth straight month to a two-year low in August as sluggish economic growth and rising unemployment keep buyers on the sidelines.】

item.title: 量子初创公司 IQM 募集资金，估值超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 芬兰量子计算初创公司IQM已获得2.75亿欧元（约合3.2亿美元）的风险投资，投资者押注于这项实验性技术能够解决实际问题。【原文：IQM, a Finnish quantum computing startup, has raised €275 million ($320 million) in venture capital funding, as investors bet on the experimental technology being able to solve real problems.】

item.title: 石油交易商发现在动荡的市场中赚钱更难了
item.description:
贡渥表示，白宫关税和中东战争带来了太多波动。【原文：

White House tariffs and Middle East war inject too much volatility, Gunvor says.

】

item.title: 科学家警告说，特朗普削减科学经费威胁到智利的天文台
item.description:
美国天文学家说，如果没有更多的资金用于望远镜的建造和研究工作，美国就有可能在这一领域失去优势。【原文：

Astrónomos estadounidenses afirman que, sin más fondos para financiar la construcción de telescopios y las operaciones de investigación, EE.UU. corre el riesgo de perder terreno en este campo.

】

item.title: 印度长期债券因有望减少供应而上扬
item.description: 较长期限的印度债券周三上涨，因为人们希望政府可能在下半财年的借贷计划中减少此类证券的供应量。【原文：Longer-dated Indian bonds rose on Wednesday amid hopes that the government may trim supply of such securities in its borrowing plan for the second half of the fiscal year.】

item.title: 中国 "伺机贬值 "引发欧洲贸易震荡
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注中国的货币管理及其对欧洲的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at China’s currency management and its impact on Europe. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Benchmark 的彼得-芬顿（Peter Fenton）还没准备好说这是人工智能泡沫
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，凯特-克拉克（Kate Clark）与 Benchmark 合伙人彼得-芬顿（Peter Fenton）坐在一起，探讨在人工智能初创公司占主导地位的时代，公司的投资策略。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kate Clark sits down with Benchmark partner Peter Fenton to talk about the firm’s investment strategy in an era dominated by artificial intelligence startups.】

item.title: 特朗普希望最高法院迅速做出裁决以推进关税进程
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他的政府将要求最高法院迅速做出裁决，希望推翻下级法院的判决— 最近在上诉中维持原判— 该判决认定他的许多关税是非法征收的。【原文：President Donald Trump said his administration would ask the Supreme Court for a quick ruling in hopes of overturning a lower court’s decision — recently upheld on appeal — that concluded many of his tariffs were imposed illegally.】

item.title: Benchmark 豪赌 Exa，欲成为人工智能时代的谷歌
item.description:
本轮 8500 万美元的融资使 Exa 的估值达到 7 亿美元。【原文：

The $85 million funding round values Exa at $700 million. 

】

item.title: Polestar 因美国关税和电动汽车发展放缓而损失 7.39 亿美元
item.description: 由于美国提高关税和电动汽车需求持续疲软，Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc 对其一款运动型多用途车进行了 7.39 亿美元的减记。【原文：Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc took a $739 million writedown on one of its sport utility vehicles due to higher US tariffs and continued weak demand for electric cars.】

item.title: 领导扭转局势的总理寻求第三任期，牙买加进入投票阶段
item.description: 在牙买加总理安德鲁-霍尔内斯（Andrew Holness）寻求罕见的第三个任期之际，他可以指出债务下降、犯罪率崩溃和失业率创历史新低。但这可能还不够。【原文：As Prime Minister Andrew Holness seeks a rare third term in Jamaica, he can point to falling debt, collapsing crime rates and record low unemployment. It might not be enough.】

item.title: 欧洲 AT1 债券热潮为何令资深投资者感到恐慌？
item.description: 被称为 AT1 债券的附加一级债券的表现一直优于全球大多数其他金融资产，其收益率比一些风险承受能力最强的对冲基金还要高。这些债券主要由欧洲银行发行，其丰厚的收益率吸引了众多投资者。【原文：Additional Tier 1 bonds, known as AT1s, have been outperforming most other financial assets on the planet, producing bigger returns than some of most risk-tolerant hedge funds. The beefy yields on these instruments, issued mostly by European banks, have made them a magnet for investors.】

item.title: 土耳其国家银行在裁决后出售 50 亿美元以保卫里拉
item.description: 土耳其国家贷款机构在周二和周三抛售了约 50 亿美元来支撑里拉，以阻止因针对高级反对派人士的法院裁决而引发的抛售。【原文：Turkish state lenders sold an estimated $5 billion to support the lira on Tuesday and Wednesday in an effort to stem a selloff sparked by a court ruling targeting senior opposition figures.】
